data.lyric:
[ti:betty]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]betty (Explicit) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:00.36]Written by：Taylor Swift/William Bowery
[00:00.72]© 2020 TASRM Publishing, administered by：Songs Of Universal, Inc. (BMI), William Bowery Music
[00:01.09]Publishing, administered by：Songs Of Universal, Inc. (BMI)
[00:01.45]All Rights Reserved. Used By Permission.
[00:01.73]Produced by：Aaron Dessner/Jack Antonoff/Taylor Swift
[00:02.13]Recorded by：Laura Sisk at the Kitty Committee Studio (Los Angeles, CA), Jack Antonoff at Rough Customer Studio (Brooklyn, NY)
[00:03.05]Assistant Engineering by：John Rooney
[00:03.27]Recorded by：Jonathan Low and Aaron Dessner at Long Pond (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:03.86]Mixed by：Serban Ghenea at Mixstar Studios (Virginia Beach, VA)
[00:04.32]Engineered by：John Hanes
[00:04.50]Mastered by：Randy Merrill at Sterling Sound (New York, NY)
[00:04.96]Drums, Percussion, Bass, Electric and Acoustic Guitars, Organ, Mellotron by：Jack Antonoff at Rough Customer Studio (Brooklyn, NY)
[00:05.78]Percussion, Piano, Bass, High String Guitar and Electric Guitar by：Aaron Dessner (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:06.46]Mellotron, Pedal Steel, Wurlitzer, Harpsichord, Vibraphone, Electric Guitar by：Mikey Freedom Hart at Hook and Fade (Brooklyn, NY)
[00:07.28]Saxophones, Clarinet by：Evan Smith at Pleasure Hill Recording (Portland, ME)
[00:07.78]Harmonica, Electric Guitar and Lap Steel by：Josh Kaufman, recorded by Josh Kaufman (New York, NY)
[00:11.56]Betty I won't make assumptions about
[00:14.46]Why you switched your homeroom
[00:16.22]But I think it's cause of me
[00:21.38]Betty one time I was riding on my skateboard
[00:24.95]When I passed your house
[00:26.67]It's like I couldn't breathe
[00:31.10]You heard the rumors from Inez
[00:33.50]You can't believe a word she says
[00:36.22]Most times but this time it was true
[00:40.52]The worst thing that I ever did
[00:45.50]Was what I did to you
[00:52.33]But if I just showed up at your party
[00:55.01]Would you have me
[00:56.23]Would you want me
[00:57.58]Would you tell me to go f**k myself
[01:00.26]Or lead me to the garden
[01:02.42]In the garden would you trust me
[01:05.08]If I told you it was just a summer thing
[01:08.79]I'm only seventeen
[01:10.42]I don't know anything
[01:12.37]But I know I miss you
[01:23.83]Betty I know where it all went wrong your favorite song
[01:27.87]Was playing from the far side of the gym
[01:33.59]I was nowhere to be found
[01:35.89]I hate the crowds
[01:37.16]You know that
[01:38.82]Plus I saw you dance with him
[01:43.53]You heard the rumors from Inez
[01:46.00]You can't believe a word she says
[01:48.59]Most times but this time it was true
[01:53.02]The worst thing that I ever did
[01:57.86]Was what I did to you
[02:04.83]But if I just showed up at your party
[02:07.41]Would you have me
[02:08.70]Would you want me
[02:09.97]Would you tell me to go f**k myself
[02:12.84]Or lead me to the garden
[02:14.89]In the garden would you trust me
[02:17.51]If I told you it was just a summer thing
[02:21.13]I'm only seventeen
[02:22.85]I don't know anything
[02:24.55]But I know I miss you
[02:36.09]I was walking home on broken cobblestones
[02:39.75]Just thinking of you
[02:41.46]When she pulled up
[02:42.52]Like a figment of my worst intentions
[02:45.55]She said James get in let's drive
[02:48.82]Those days turned into nights
[02:51.14]Slept next to her but
[02:53.36]I dreamt of you all summer long
[03:13.99]Betty I'm here on your doorstep
[03:16.38]And I planned it out for weeks now
[03:18.82]But it's finally sinking in
[03:23.87]Betty right now is the last time
[03:26.28]I can dream about what happens when you see my face again
[03:32.81]The only thing I wanna do
[03:37.85]Is make it up to you
[03:45.16]So I showed up at your party
[03:55.10]Yeah I showed up at your party
[04:04.82]Yeah I showed up at your party
[04:07.52]Will you have me
[04:08.62]Will you love me
[04:10.08]Will you kiss me on the porch in front of all your stupid friends
[04:14.84]If you kiss me
[04:16.16]Will it be just like I dreamed it
[04:18.90]Will it patch your broken wings
[04:21.04]I'm only seventeen
[04:22.86]I don't know anything
[04:24.66]But I know I miss you
[04:29.73]Standing in your cardigan
[04:34.76]Kissing in my car again
[04:38.44]Stopped at a streetlight
[04:39.95]You know I miss you
data.trans:

[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]

[00:11.56]Betty 我不会胡乱猜测
[00:14.46]你更换年级指导教室的原因
[00:16.22]可我觉得是因为我的缘故
[00:21.38]Betty 一次我玩着滑板
[00:24.95]当我经过你家时
[00:26.67]我好像无法呼吸了
[00:31.10]你从Inez那里听到流言蜚语
[00:33.50]她说的话 你一个字都不信
[00:36.22]大多时候她信口胡诌 可这次她说的是真的
[00:40.52]我做过的最糟糕的事情
[00:45.50]就是我对你的过分行为
[00:52.33]倘若我出现在你的舞会上
[00:55.01]你是否愿意接受我
[00:56.23]你是否希望我来见你
[00:57.58]你会不会对我恶语相向
[01:00.26]或是把我带到花园里
[01:02.42]在花园里 你能否相信我
[01:05.08]如果我告诉你这只是夏日的悸动
[01:08.79]我只有十七岁
[01:10.42]我懵懂无知
[01:12.37]可我知道我想念你
[01:23.83]Betty 我知道症结所在 你最喜欢的歌
[01:27.87]正播放着 歌声从体育馆的另一边传来
[01:33.59]哪里也找不到我的人影
[01:35.89]我讨厌熙熙攘攘的人群
[01:37.16]你知道的一清二楚
[01:38.82]而且 我看见你与他共舞
[01:43.53]你从Inez那里听到流言蜚语
[01:46.00]她说的话 你一个字都不信
[01:48.59]大多时候她信口胡诌 可这次她说的是真的
[01:53.02]我做过的最糟糕的事情
[01:57.86]就是我对你的过分行为
[02:04.83]倘若我出现在你的舞会上
[02:07.41]你是否愿意接受我
[02:08.70]你是否希望我来见你
[02:09.97]你会不会对我恶语相向
[02:12.84]或是把我带到花园里
[02:14.89]在花园里 你能否相信我
[02:17.51]如果我告诉你这只是夏日的悸动
[02:21.13]我只有十七岁
[02:22.85]我懵懂无知
[02:24.55]可我知道我想念你
[02:36.09]我沿着碎石子路往家走去
[02:39.75]心里一直想着你
[02:41.46]当她出现
[02:42.52]就好像我满怀恶意 凭空臆想
[02:45.55]她说 James 上车 我们去兜风吧
[02:48.82]那些日子变成黑夜
[02:51.14]在她身旁酣然入睡 但是
[02:53.36]一整个夏天 我都梦见你
[03:13.99]Betty 我就在你家门口
[03:16.38]我已经计划了好几个星期
[03:18.82]可最终无济于事
[03:23.87]Betty 现在是最后一次了
[03:26.28]我可以想象得到你再次见到时我会做的事
[03:32.81]我唯一想做的事
[03:37.85]就是竭尽全力弥补你
[03:45.16]所以 我去参加你的舞会
[03:55.10]我去参加你的舞会
[04:04.82]我去参加你的舞会
[04:07.52]你是否愿意接受我
[04:08.62]你是否爱着我
[04:10.08]你会不会当着你那些迟钝的朋友的面 在门廊上吻我
[04:14.84]如果你主动吻我
[04:16.16]会不会像我梦里的那般美好
[04:18.90]能否让你折断的翅膀完好如初
[04:21.04]我只有十七岁
[04:22.86]我懵懂无知
[04:24.66]可我知道我想念你
[04:29.73]你穿着毛衣 静静伫立
[04:34.76]我们又在我的车里热情拥吻
[04:38.44]我把车停在路灯下
[04:39.95]你知道我思念着你
